Message References:
How you pass a specific message to the bot. In order of most to least prioritized:

-No input, which will pick the most recent message.
-An ID of a message in the same channel. (You'll need to enable developer mode. User Settings -> Appearance -> Developer Mode)
-A link to a message in the same server.
**The rest of the methods can only go back 50 messages.**
-A user mention, which will pick the last message by that user.
-A number of messages to ascend.
-A set of ^s, pointing to the message.
-Some content of the message. Case sensitive > insensitive. Exact match > starting with input > containing the input anywhere. Underscores can be used instead of spaces.
